logger._levelComment: supports CRITICAL = [50], ERROR = [40], WARNING = [30], INFO = [20], DEBUG = [10], NOTSET = [0]
logger._rollWhenComment: supports # [midnight] - roll over at midnight, # [S] - every second # [M] - every minute # [H] - every hour # [D] - every day, # [W{0-6}] - roll over on a certain day; 0 - Monday
